message.content:
I apologize for the mistake. Here is the corrected response:

{"Thoughts":{"Text":"I have the coordinates for my current location. Now I need to call emergency services using the local emergency number.","Reasoning":"Emergency services have the expertise and equipment to provide proper medical care to the injured player. It is important to act quickly to get them the help they need.","Plan":"- Use the local emergency number to call emergency services.\n- Provide them with my current location coordinates and a description of the situation.\n- Stay with the injured player and provide reassurance until help arrives.","Criticism":"None","Speak":"I have the coordinates for my current location. I will call emergency services now."},"Command":{"Name":"none","Args":{}}}
